snippet: Sunderland manager David Moyes is refusing to give up on Premier League survival after his side fell six points adrift of safety following their 2-0 home loss to Manchester City on Sunday....

headline.main: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists
headline.print_headline: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists

lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager David Moyes is refusing to give up on Premier League survival after his side fell six points adrift of safety following their 2-0 home loss to Manchester City on Sunday.
